title: FS T206 Mathewson Port Brown Hindu sharp SGC 20
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS T206 Mathewson Port Brown Hindu sharp SGC 20
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I was able to upgrade this card, so I am ready to let this one go.  I will let Mr. Goodwin give you the description, and his pics are better than what my scanner will do, so below is the link to the auction that I got it from.  If anyone wants to break me even (including my shipping both ways), I am happy to pass this one along to a board member.
$1135 puts this one on your doorstep!
Due to the $$ size of this one and me looking to break even PAYPAL will need 3% added on.
Paperloss on the back is the biggest defect.

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
Original auction link:
[url]http://www.goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?lotid=8287[/url]
